body: This idea NEEDS to be done, it's where your friends name is in italic just like ocn. It makes use of friend requests!
body_tagged: This idea NEEDS to be done, it's where your friends name is in italic just like ocn. It makes use of friend requests!
title: [SUG] friend name italic

replies.body: It's good, but Avicus try to avoid blatantly copying OCN

replies.body: We already have /friends. What I personally want to see implemented is a way of doing the equivalent of /friends from this website. It means you can find out if anyone you know is playing without having to launch minecraft and would be particularly helpful to me because I am banned at the moment.
